site.name: CochlearFit Headbands
site.description: Soft-fit headbands designed to secure cochlear implant processors with breathable comfort.
footer.tagline: Headbands engineered for quiet, steady wear.
footer.disclaimer: Accessory product. Not medical advice. Always follow your clinician/audiologist guidance.
footer.safety: If irritation occurs, stop using. Wash before first wear. Check fit often during activity.
home.meta.title: CochlearFit Headbands | Secure comfort for cochlear processors
home.meta.description: Soft-fit headbands that keep cochlear implant processors steady, breathable, and comfortable.
home.hero.title: Headbands that keep processors steady and comfortable.
home.hero.body: Soft-fit headbands with hidden pockets and breathable stretch so cochlear devices stay in place.
home.promise.title: Secure fit without pressure.
home.promise.body: Designed with audiologists and wearers to reduce pressure and keep processors steady.
home.promise.point1: Pocketed design keeps hardware close to the head.
home.featured.title: Choose your headband
home.featured.body: Classic for everyday calm. Sport for movement and play.
home.fit.title: Fit support you can trust
home.fit.body: Quick tips for secure placement, even with hats, helmets, or active days.
shop.meta.title: Shop CochlearFit Headbands
shop.meta.description: Browse Classic and Sport headbands designed to secure cochlear processors.
shop.title: Choose your headband
shop.body: Classic for everyday wear, Sport for active days.

cart.emptyBody: Pick a headband style to keep processors secure and comfortable.

cart.meta.description: Review your CochlearFit headbands before checkout.

thankyou.meta.title: Thank you
faq.meta.title: CochlearFit FAQ
faq.meta.description: Answers about fit, washing, and compatibility.
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.body: Quick answers about fit, care, and compatibility.
faq.a1: Our pockets fit most behind-the-ear processors. Check compatibility notes on each product page.
faq.a2: Machine wash cold in a laundry bag, then lay flat to dry.
faq.q3: Can kids wear it with sports gear?
faq.a3: Yes. The Sport Flex pairs well with helmets and hats; use a retention clip if needed.
faq.a4: No. CochlearFit is an accessory and does not replace clinical guidance.
sizing.meta.title: Sizing guide
sizing.meta.description: Measure for a secure, comfortable CochlearFit headband.
sizing.title: Find your size
sizing.body: Measure once for a secure, comfortable fit.
sizing.step1: Measure head circumference where the headband sits.
sizing.step2: If between sizes, choose the softer fit for long wear.
sizing.step3: For intense activity, pair with a retention clip.
sizing.tip1: Kids may prefer a gentler fit.
sizing.tip3: Position the pocket near the processor for stability.
about.meta.title: About CochlearFit
about.meta.description: Why CochlearFit headbands exist and who they serve.
about.title: Designed for confident listening
about.body: CochlearFit was built to support everyday wearers and active families.
about.p1: We collaborate with audiologists and cochlear implant users to reduce pressure points and improve daily comfort.
about.p2: Every fabric is selected for softness, breathability, and secure support without over-tightening.
about.p3: Our mission is to help every wearer feel confident, from school days to workouts.
contact.meta.title: Contact CochlearFit
contact.title: We are here to help
contact.body: Send us a note and we will respond within one business day.
policy.shipping.meta.title: Shipping policy
policy.shipping.title: Shipping policy
policy.shipping.p1: Orders ship within 2-3 business days after confirmation.
policy.shipping.p2: Standard delivery takes 3-7 business days depending on destination.
policy.shipping.p3: Tracking details are emailed as soon as your order leaves our studio.
policy.returns.meta.title: Returns policy
policy.returns.meta.description: How to request a return or exchange.
policy.returns.title: Returns policy
policy.returns.p1: Returns are accepted within 30 days of delivery for unworn items.
policy.returns.p2: Contact support for a prepaid return label and instructions.
policy.returns.p3: Refunds are processed within 5 business days after inspection.
policy.privacy.meta.title: Privacy policy
policy.privacy.title: Privacy policy
policy.privacy.body: Your data stays safe and minimal.
policy.privacy.p1: We only collect data needed to fulfill your order and support you.
policy.privacy.p2: Payment details are processed securely by Stripe and never stored on our servers.
policy.privacy.p3: You can request deletion of your data by contacting support.
policy.terms.meta.title: Terms of service
policy.terms.meta.description: Terms for using CochlearFit products and site.
policy.terms.title: Terms of service
policy.terms.body: Guidelines for purchasing and using CochlearFit products.
policy.terms.p1: By purchasing, you agree to use CochlearFit headbands as an accessory product.
policy.terms.p2: Always follow clinician guidance for cochlear implant care and use.
policy.terms.p3: Contact us with any product questions before modifying your device setup.
termsSale.meta.title: EU Terms of Sale
termsSale.meta.description: Legal terms for CochlearFit headbands purchased for EU delivery.
termsSale.page.title: EU Terms of Sale
termsSale.page.description: A detailed explanation of your rights and obligations when ordering within the European Union.
termsSale.intro.contents.title: Contents
termsSale.contents.returnsCondition: Condition of returns and diminished value
termsSale.contents.defective: Damaged on arrival, incorrect items, and defective goods
termsSale.seller.title: 1) Seller information
termsSale.seller.body1: These Terms and Conditions of Sale (“Terms”) apply to purchases made through the Ear Solutions online store (the “Store”) for delivery within the European Union (EU) destinations offered at checkout.
termsSale.seller.body2: If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not place an order.
termsSale.scope.title: 2) Scope and definitions
termsSale.scope.forConsumers: These Terms apply to purchases made by consumers (individuals acting for purposes outside their trade, business, craft, or profession).
termsSale.scope.businessCustomers: If you are purchasing as a business customer, please contact us before ordering; additional or different terms may apply.
termsSale.scope.definitions.consumer: “Consumer” means a natural person acting outside a trade, business, craft, or profession.
termsSale.scope.definitions.goods: “Goods” means the physical products sold on the Store.
termsSale.scope.definitions.order: “Order” means the purchase request you submit through the checkout.
termsSale.scope.definitions.workingDay: “Working day” means Monday to Friday, excluding public holidays in Italy.
termsSale.scope.definitions.standardDeli: “Standard delivery” means the least expensive delivery option we offer for a given Order at checkout.
termsSale.products.title: 3) Products and product information
termsSale.products.whatWeSell.heading: 3.1 What we sell
termsSale.products.whatWeSell.body: We sell children’s headbands and related accessories intended to help hold behind‑the‑ear sound processors more securely during everyday use. Our main product families include:
termsSale.products.compatibility.heading: 3.2 Compatibility and brand references
termsSale.products.compatibility.body: Our products are designed to be compatible with behind‑the‑ear sound processor setups. Where we reference third‑party brands, those names are trademarks of their respective owners. Skylar SRL is not affiliated with or endorsed by any third‑party brand unless explicitly stated.
termsSale.products.noMedical.heading: 3.3 No medical claims
termsSale.products.noMedical.body: Our Goods are accessories. We do not make medical claims about hearing outcomes or device performance. Any references to “comfort”, “fit”, “secure feel”, “confidence”, or “appearance” are not medical claims.
termsSale.products.patterns.heading: 3.4 Patterns, colours, and images
termsSale.products.patterns.body: Patterns and colours may appear slightly different due to lighting, screen settings, and material batches. For patterned items, pattern placement may vary. This does not affect your statutory rights.
termsSale.products.smallParts.heading: 3.5 Small parts / supervision
termsSale.products.smallParts.body: Some components (including Spare Loops) may be small parts. Keep small parts away from young children and use with appropriate adult supervision.
termsSale.ordering.title: 4) Ordering and contract formation
termsSale.ordering.placing.heading: 4.1 Placing an order
termsSale.ordering.placing.body: You place an Order by completing checkout and submitting payment.
termsSale.ordering.contractFormation.bod: A contract is formed when we accept your Order by sending an order confirmation email and taking payment (or confirming payment capture).
termsSale.ordering.orderLimits.heading: 4.3 Order limits and refusal
termsSale.ordering.orderLimits.body: We may refuse or cancel an Order if:
termsSale.ordering.orderLimits.reasonAdd: the delivery address is not supported or is in an excluded region,
termsSale.ordering.orderLimits.reasonPri: there is an obvious pricing or listing error,
termsSale.ordering.orderLimits.reasonFra: we reasonably suspect fraud or misuse.
termsSale.ordering.orderLimits.cancellat: If we cancel an Order after payment, we will refund you.
termsSale.prices.title: 5) Prices, VAT, and promotions
termsSale.prices.currency.heading: 5.1 Currency and VAT
termsSale.prices.currency.body: Prices are shown in EUR and include VAT where applicable, unless clearly stated otherwise on the Store.
termsSale.prices.shipping.heading: 5.2 Shipping costs
termsSale.prices.shipping.body: Shipping costs are not included in product prices and are shown at checkout based on your delivery address and chosen delivery option.
termsSale.prices.promotions.heading: 5.3 Promotions and bundles
termsSale.prices.promotions.body: We may offer discounts and bundles with fixed bundle pricing. If you return part of a discounted bundle order, refunds are calculated based on the discounted effective value allocated to each item (see Section 9.4).
termsSale.payment.title: 6) Payment
termsSale.payment.methods.heading: 6.1 Accepted payment methods
termsSale.payment.methods.additional: Additional payment methods may be added later.
termsSale.payment.security.heading: 6.2 Payment security
termsSale.payment.security.body: Payments are processed by our payment provider. We do not store full payment card details on our servers.
termsSale.delivery.title: 7) Delivery, shipping options, and shipping restrictions
termsSale.delivery.territories.heading: 7.1 Delivery territories
termsSale.delivery.territories.euOnly: The Store is EU-only. We currently offer delivery only to the EU destinations presented at checkout.
termsSale.delivery.territories.mainlandP: Mainland-only shipping (launch policy): We ship to mainland Italy, Germany, France, and Spain only, with specific excluded regions (see 7.2).
termsSale.delivery.territories.excludedA: If your address is excluded, available shipping options will not be shown and you will not be able to complete checkout.
termsSale.delivery.excludedRegions.sicil: We currently ship to Sicilia, and we also accept orders to Livigno and Campione d’Italia when supported by our checkout configuration.
termsSale.delivery.excludedRegions.updat: We may update this list over time.
termsSale.delivery.carriers.heading: 7.3 Carriers
termsSale.delivery.carriers.intl: Germany/France/Spain: DHL (service depends on your selected shipping option)
termsSale.delivery.options.heading: 7.4 Shipping options and live rates
termsSale.delivery.options.body: Shipping prices and available services are calculated at checkout using live carrier rates. Customers may choose from the services available for their destination.
termsSale.delivery.dispatch.heading: 7.5 Dispatch schedule and “same-day dispatch”
termsSale.delivery.dispatch.schedule: We dispatch Orders Monday to Friday only.
termsSale.delivery.dispatch.condition.co: the Order is fully processed and confirmed by email, and
termsSale.delivery.dispatch.condition.ti: this happens before 11:00 Italy time on a working day.
termsSale.delivery.times.heading: 7.6 Delivery times
termsSale.delivery.times.body: Any delivery times shown are estimates and can be affected by factors beyond our control (e.g., carrier delays, weather, customs or special territory processes, strikes, and peak periods).
termsSale.delivery.risk.heading: 7.7 Risk and title
termsSale.delivery.risk.body: Risk of loss passes to you when you (or a person you nominate) take physical possession of the Goods.
termsSale.delivery.risk.titleBody: Title to the Goods passes to you once we have received full payment.
termsSale.withdrawal.title: 8) Your statutory right of withdrawal (EU consumers)
termsSale.withdrawal.right.heading: 8.1 14-day withdrawal right
termsSale.withdrawal.right.body: If you are a consumer, you generally have the right to withdraw from a distance contract within 14 days of receiving the Goods, without giving any reason.
termsSale.withdrawal.howTo.heading: 8.2 How to exercise withdrawal
termsSale.withdrawal.howTo.body1: To withdraw, you must inform us of your decision within the 14-day period by an unequivocal statement (e.g., email). You may use a withdrawal form template (
termsSale.withdrawal.deadline.heading: 8.3 Return deadline after notifying withdrawal
termsSale.withdrawal.deadline.body: After notifying us, you must send back the Goods within 14 days.
termsSale.withdrawal.shippingCosts.body: Unless we agree otherwise, you bear the direct cost of returning the Goods when you withdraw.
termsSale.withdrawal.refundTiming.body: We will reimburse you without undue delay and no later than 14 days from the day we are informed of your decision to withdraw. We may withhold reimbursement until we have received the Goods back or you have provided evidence of having sent them back.
termsSale.withdrawal.refunds.productPric: the product price you paid, and
termsSale.withdrawal.refunds.standardDel: the cost of standard delivery (the least expensive delivery option we offered at checkout for your Order).
termsSale.withdrawal.whatWeRefund.expres: If you chose a more expensive delivery option (e.g., express), we do not refund the extra cost above standard delivery.
termsSale.withdrawal.noExchanges.heading: 8.7 No exchanges
termsSale.withdrawal.noExchanges.body: We do not offer exchanges. If you want a different size or pattern, you may place a new Order and (if eligible) withdraw from the original purchase under these Terms.
termsSale.returnsCondition.title: 9) Condition of returns and diminished value
termsSale.returnsCondition.reasonableHan: You may inspect and try on the Goods as you would in a shop, but you are responsible for any diminished value caused by handling beyond what is necessary to establish the nature, characteristics, and functioning of the Goods.
termsSale.returnsCondition.hygiene.body: Because headbands are worn close to hair and skin, we ask you to handle them hygienically if you think you may return them:
termsSale.returnsCondition.hygiene.tryOn: try on briefly over clean, dry hair
termsSale.returnsCondition.hygiene.noWat: do not use in water if you may return
termsSale.returnsCondition.hygiene.noWas: do not wash before deciding to keep
termsSale.returnsCondition.refundReducti: If returned Goods show handling beyond what is necessary for inspection (for example, obvious signs of prolonged wear, odours, stains, hair, stretching beyond normal try-on, or water exposure), we may reduce your refund to reflect the diminished value, in line with applicable law.
termsSale.returnsCondition.bundles.body: If you purchased a bundle or received a discount:
termsSale.returnsCondition.bundles.alloc: We allocate the bundle or discounted price across the items pro-rata based on standalone prices.
termsSale.returnsCondition.bundles.refun: Refunds for returned items are calculated using their allocated discounted value.
termsSale.returnsCondition.bundles.deliv: If only part of an Order is returned, we may refund outbound standard delivery costs pro-rata (for example, in proportion to the number of items returned), consistent with the approach disclosed in these Terms.
termsSale.defective.title: 10) Damaged on arrival, incorrect items, and defective goods
termsSale.defective.damage.heading: 10.1 Damage in transit / wrong item
termsSale.defective.damage.body: If the Goods arrive damaged or we sent the wrong item, contact us promptly with your order number and photos of the item and packaging. We will offer an appropriate remedy (replacement or refund) depending on circumstances.
termsSale.defective.guarantee.heading: 10.2 Legal guarantee (lack of conformity)
termsSale.defective.guarantee.body1: EU consumer law provides a legal guarantee for goods that are not in conformity with the contract. Generally, the seller is liable for lack of conformity that exists at delivery and becomes apparent within at least two years, with specific rules varying by Member State.
termsSale.defective.guarantee.body2: Where applicable, you may be entitled to repair, replacement, price reduction, or termination/refund depending on the issue and legal framework.
termsSale.returnsAddress.title: 11) Returns address and instructions
termsSale.returnsAddress.body: Unless we instruct otherwise, returns should be sent to:
termsSale.returnsAddress.instructions: We may provide additional instructions to ensure correct routing and efficient processing.
termsSale.customerService.title: 12) Customer service and complaints
termsSale.customerService.body: If you have a complaint, please contact customer support (see Section 1). We aim to respond within a reasonable time.
termsSale.customerService.odr.heading: Online Dispute Resolution (ODR)
termsSale.customerService.odr.body: The EU’s former Online Dispute Resolution platform has been discontinued. If you need assistance with cross-border consumer issues, you may consult EU consumer redress resources and your local consumer authority.
termsSale.liability.title: 13) Limitation of liability
termsSale.liability.body: Nothing in these Terms limits or excludes liability where it would be unlawful to do so, including liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence, fraud, or any non-waivable consumer rights.
termsSale.liability.bullets.forceMajeure: We are not liable for losses caused by events beyond our reasonable control (see Force Majeure).
termsSale.liability.bullets.carriers: We are not responsible for delays or failures caused by carriers, provided we have dispatched the Goods as described.
termsSale.forceMajeure.title: 14) Force majeure
termsSale.forceMajeure.body: We are not responsible for failure or delay in performing obligations due to events beyond our reasonable control, including (without limitation) carrier disruptions, strikes, severe weather, and other events outside our control.
termsSale.governingLaw.title: 15) Governing law and jurisdiction
termsSale.governingLaw.body1: These Terms are governed by the laws of Italy, without prejudice to mandatory consumer protection rules that apply in your country of residence within the EU.
termsSale.governingLaw.body2: If you are a consumer, you may bring proceedings in the courts of your Member State of residence, where applicable, and we may be required to bring proceedings there as well.
termsSale.changes.title: 16) Changes to these Terms
termsSale.changes.body: We may update these Terms from time to time. The version published on the Store at the time you place your Order applies to that Order.
termsSale.annex.title: Annex A — Model withdrawal form
termsSale.annex.intro: (Complete and return this form only if you wish to withdraw from the contract.)
termsSale.annex.to: To: Skylar SRL, Via Guglielmo Marconi 358, Positano, 84017, Italy —
termsSale.annex.goodsLine: I/We (*) hereby give notice that I/We (*) withdraw from my/our (*) contract of sale of the following goods:
termsSale.annex.signatureLine: Signature of consumer(s) (only if this form is notified on paper): ______________________________
error.title: Something went wrong
error.body: We hit a snag. Refresh the page or try again in a moment.
notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.body: The page you are looking for does not exist. Try one of these paths.
product.classic.name: Classic Secure
product.classic.shortDescription: Soft rib-knit headband with a hidden processor pocket.
product.classic.longDescription: The Classic Secure is our everyday headband designed to keep cochlear processors snug without pressure points. The hidden pocket cradles hardware discreetly while the breathable knit stays gentle on the skin.
product.classic.feature1: Hidden processor pocket keeps devices steady on the go
product.classic.feature2: Low-profile seams to reduce pressure points
product.classic.feature3: Stretch rib knit that hugs without squeezing
product.classic.care1: Machine wash cold in a laundry bag
product.classic.care3: Do not bleach or tumble dry
product.classic.compatibility2: Pocket opening works for left or right wear
product.classic.compatibility3: Pairs well with earmolds and coils
product.classic.image1Alt: Classic Secure headband in sand color
product.classic.image2Alt: Close-up of the Classic Secure pocket
product.sport.name: Sport Flex
product.sport.shortDescription: Moisture-wicking band with soft grip dots for movement.
product.sport.longDescription: Sport Flex is built for dance, play, and workouts. A lightweight performance knit and gentle grip dots keep processors secure while letting heat escape.
product.sport.feature2: Soft silicone grip dots reduce shifting
product.sport.care3: Air dry away from direct heat
product.sport.compatibility2: Use with retention clips for extra security
product.sport.compatibility3: Ideal for sports helmets and hats
product.sport.image1Alt: Sport Flex headband in ocean color
product.sport.image2Alt: Sport Flex headband showing grip texture
